author: rfeng
msg: Fix the alert-aggregator demo to work with the latest trunk code
* Change the service name to be "Collection"

author: malderson
msg: Fixed a problem where two CSN's generated in the same millisecond could be the same (DIRSERVER-940).  Now the operation sequence number is always incremented which also gives us some protection against system clock changes.

author: rjung
msg: Since we are now moving to doing orderly shutdown in all
regular cases, we should also do it for AJP12.

author: fbarnaby
msg: Original source contribution from Sun Microsystems

author: rjung
msg: The lock line has been moved in r552292, so we should
also move the result check for the locking.
